about_the_game:
This demo includes the current development build of Super Dungeon Designer exclusively for Steam Next Fest 2023!

Features:
- Build dungeons with all available items/objects/enemies/decor/tiles for the Castle Theme
- Resize, add and modify many rooms in your dungeon
- Upload your dungeons and downloaded the dungeons created by other players
- Play in up to 4-player local co-op and design dungeons with co-op puzzles in mind
- Link objects together to trigger events
- Customize your Boss fight with our first Boss: Gooliath!
- much much more!

For more information, see our Playtest FAQ in the Community section.

name: Super Dungeon Designer Demo
short_description: Build your own Action-Adventure dungeons and share them with others!Our user friendly and intuitive builder makes creating dungeons fun and easy! Upload your levels and play levels from other designers! Play up to 4 player co-op! Inspired by games like Zelda and Super Mario Maker.
